snippet.title: Top Nonprofit Job Interview Questions (What I look for when hiring)
snippet.description:
Common Nonprofit NGO job interview questions! Thinking of working for a nonprofit or social enterprise organization? I asked nonprofit Executive Directors and hiring managers what job interview questions they ask job candidates for nonprofit work. They shared their favorite questions that, answered well, can help you get a nonprofit job with a great organization. 

I have hired my fair share of employees for the 501c3 nonprofit I started many years ago. At this point, I have a pretty good sense of who will be a good fit for the job. If you’re starting a nonprofit organization yourself, you might want to keep these things in mind for when it is time for you to hire your own team. 

I hope this helps!

// WHAT TO WATCH NEXT

7 Mistakes I Made Starting a Non Profit 
https://youtu.be/75rPHdXU5P0

How Successful Nonprofits Fundraise when Starting and Growing
https://youtu.be/-HeFuJRb1N4

Work from Home Jobs for Nonprofits and Social Impact (and where to find them)
https://youtu.be/mVANq9PyyGs

// MORE ABOUT ME

Hi! I’m Amber, a nonprofit founder, Executive Director, and public speaker on social impact, changemaking, nonprofits, leadership, and more. Want me to come speak at your business, college, school, or event? Reach out: https://ambermsmith.com/

My Nonprofit Founder to Full-Time Academy -- with online trainings to guide you through the steps to start a nonprofit (in the USA) and more -- is now LIVE! http://foundertofulltime.com/

On Facebook? Talk to me and other change makers about social change, nonprofits, social enterprise, leadership and more in my Facebook group, Change the World or Bust: https://www.facebook.com/groups/changetheworldorbust/ 

Join my newsletter! https://ambermsmith.com/blog/newsletter/

I'm also on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ambermelsmith

Pics of me and my cute dog on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ambermelsmith/
tags: how to work for a nonprofit
